description.en-US:
BrainIncubator helps healthcare professionals transition to ICD-11 with comprehensive training modules, assessments, and progress tracking. Features include:

• Interactive training modules
• Self, team, and organizational assessments
• Progress tracking and notifications
• Dark mode support
• Comprehensive ICD-11 documentation
• Privacy-focused local data storage

releaseNotes.en-US:
Initial release of BrainIncubator:
• Complete ICD-11 training modules
• Assessment tools for individuals and teams
• Progress tracking and notifications
• Dark mode support

en-US.name: BrainIncubator
en-US.subtitle: AI-Powered Learning Platform
en-US.description: BrainIncubator is an innovative learning platform that uses artificial intelligence to create personalized learning experiences. Track your progress, receive smart recommendations, and achieve your learning goals efficiently.
en-US.promotional_text: Experience the future of learning with AI-powered personalization
en-US.release_notes: Initial release with core learning features and AI-powered recommendations
